page_content: The page provides information about child-related data, including child care costs and educational expenses.
The page advises early arrival for a football match due to limited parking and expected high attendance.
The page discusses non-taxable income types, such as public or private support and tax-free lottery winnings.
The page provides information about the 7th stage of the Tour de Suisse 2009, including traffic disruptions and safety guidelines.
The page discusses a survey on the satisfaction with the tax administration and mentions the use of TaxMe-Online software for tax filing.
